#drawing dendogram
import scipy.cluster.hierarchy as shc

plt.figure(figsize=(50, 10))  
plt.title("Shopping Dendograms")  
dend = shc.dendrogram(shc.linkage(s, method='single'))
source.cb3382fd:
#Now clustering the data points
from sklearn.cluster import AgglomerativeClustering

cluster = AgglomerativeClustering(n_clusters=2, affinity='euclidean', linkage='single')  
cluster_labels=cluster.fit_predict(s)  
print(cluster.labels_) 
print(cluster_labels) 

plt.scatter(s[:,0],s[:,1], c=cluster_labels, cmap='rainbow')
source.9a4b1660:
# Using Silhouette_score
from sklearn.metrics import silhouette_score
silhouette_avg = silhouette_score(s, cluster_labels)
print("For n_clusters =", 2,
          "The average silhouette_score is :", silhouette_avg)
source.232fa127:
#Now clustering the data points
from sklearn.cluster import AgglomerativeClustering

cluster = AgglomerativeClustering(n_clusters=2, affinity='euclidean', linkage='complete')  
cluster_labels1=cluster.fit_predict(s)  
print(cluster.labels_) 
print(cluster_labels1) 

plt.scatter(s[:,0],s[:,1], c=cluster_labels1, cmap='rainbow')
source.3ebd1f13:
# Using Silhouette_score
from sklearn.metrics import silhouette_score
silhouette_avg = silhouette_score(s, cluster_labels1)
print("For n_clusters =", 2,
          "The average silhouette_score is :", silhouette_avg)
